chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (e : expr) (n : nat), is_const e n = true -> forall (l : seq R) (x1 x2 : R), interp (set_nth 0 l n x1) e = interp (set_nth 0 l n x2) e

Premises:
Notation seq := list
set_nth : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T -> seq T
*** [ R : Set ]
interp = fix interp (l : seq R) (e : expr) {struct e} : R := match e with | Var n => nth R0 l n | AppExt k f le => apply k f (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | AppExtD k f n le => Derive_Rn k f n (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | App e1 e2 => interp (interp l e2 :: l) e1 | Subst e1 e2 => interp (set_nth R0 l 0 (interp l e2)) e1 | Cst c => c | Binary o e1 e2 => match o with | Eplus => Rplus | Emult => Rmult end (interp l e1) (interp l e2) | Unary o e0 =>
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive expr : Type := Var : nat -> expr | AppExt : forall k : nat, Rn k R -> seq expr -> expr | AppExtD : forall k : nat, Rn k R -> nat -> seq expr -> expr | App : expr -> expr -> expr | Subst : expr -> expr -> expr | Cst : R -> expr | Binary : bop -> expr -> expr -> expr | Unary : uop -> expr -> expr | Int : expr -> expr -> expr -> expr For Var: Argument scope is [nat_scope] For AppExt: Argument scopes are [nat_scope _ list_scope] For AppExtD: Argument scopes are [nat_scope _ nat_scope list_scope] For Cst: Argument scope is [R_scope]
is_const = fix is_const (e : expr) (n : nat) {struct e} : bool := match e with | Var v => ~~ ssrnat.eqn v n | AppExt _ _ le => foldr (fun (v : expr) (acc : bool) => is_const v n && acc) true le | AppExtD _ _ _ _ => false | App f e0 => is_const f (S n) && is_const e0 n | Subst f e0 => (ssrnat.eqn n 0 || is_const f n) && is_const e0 n | Cst _ => true | Binary _ e1 e2 => is_const e1 n && is_const e2 n | Unary _ e0 => is_const e0 n | Int f e1 e2 => [&& is_const f (S n),
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
interp_domain = fix interp_domain (l : seq R) (d : domain) {struct d} : Prop := match d with | Never => False | Always => True | Partial p e => p (interp l e) | Derivable n k f le => ex_derive_Rn k f n (nth 0 [seq interp l i | i <- le]) | Derivable2 m n k f le => let le' := [seq interp l i | i <- le] in locally_2d (fun u v : R => ex_derive_Rn k f m (fun i : nat => if ssrnat.eqn i m then u else if ssrnat.eqn i n then v else nth 0 le' i)) (nth 0 le' m) (nth 0 le' n) /\ continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => Derive_Rn k f m (fun i : nat => if ssrnat.eqn i m...
domain_rect : forall P : domain -> Type, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (P0 : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial P0 e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable n k r l)) -> (forall (n n0 k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable2 n n0 k r l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (n n0 : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 n n0 e)) -> (forall e e0 e1 : expr, P (Integrable e e0 e1)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
domain_ind : forall P : domain -> Prop, P Never -> P Always -> (forall (P0 : R -> Prop) (e : expr), P (Partial P0 e)) -> (forall (n k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable n k r l)) -> (forall (n n0 k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (Derivable2 n n0 k r l)) -> (forall (n : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous n e)) -> (forall (n n0 : nat) (e : expr), P (Continuous2 n n0 e)) -> (forall e e0 e1 : expr, P (Integrable e e0 e1)) ->...-> forall d : domain, P d
expr_rec : forall P : expr -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
expr_ind : forall P : expr -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e
expr_rect : forall P : expr -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (Var n)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (l : seq expr), P (AppExt k r l)) -> (forall (k : nat) (r : Rn k R) (n : nat) (l : seq expr), P (AppExtD k r n l)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (App e e0)) -> (forall e : expr, P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Subst e e0)) -> (forall r : R, P (Cst r)) -> (forall (b : bop) (e : expr), P e -> forall e0 : expr, P e0 -> P (Binary b e e0)) ->...-> forall e : expr, P e

RField_lemma5 : forall (l : seq R) (l1 : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)), (forall lock : seq (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z) -> Prop, lock = PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l -> lock (Fapp (Fcons2 0%Z 1%Z Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp Zeq_bool Z.quotrem) l1 [::])) -> PCond 0 1 Rplus Rmult Rminus Ropp eq IZR N.to_nat pow l l1
nth_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), ssrfun.eqfun (nth x0 (set_nth x0 s n y)) (ssrfun.fun_of_simpl (ssrfun.SimplFunDelta (fun _ : eqtype.Equality.sort ssrnat.nat_eqType => eqtype.app_fdelta (eqtype.FunDelta (aT:=ssrnat.nat_eqType) n y) (nth x0 s))))
nth_nil : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat), nth x0 [::] n = x0
ssrnat.CompareNatEq : forall m n : nat, m = n -> ssrnat.compare_nat m n true true false false true true
Ring_polynom.ring_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe1) (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe2)
